sn44.1:1.1: Ekam samayam bhagava savatthiyam viharati jetavane anathapindikassa arame.
sn44.1:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena khema bhikkhuni kosalesu carikam caramana antara ca savatthim antara ca saketam toranavatthusmim vasam upagata hoti.
sn44.1:1.3: Atha kho raja pasenadi kosalo saketa savatthim gacchanto, antara ca saketam antara ca savatthim toranavatthusmim ekarattivasam upagacchi.
sn44.1:1.4: Atha kho raja pasenadi kosalo annataram purisam amantesi:
sn44.1:1.5: “ehi tvam, ambho purisa, toranavatthusmim tatharupam samanam va brahmanam va jana yamaham ajja payirupaseyyan”ti.
sn44.1:2.1: “Evam, deva”ti kho so puriso ranno pasenadissa kosalassa patissutva kevalakappam toranavatthum ahindanto naddasa tatharupam samanam va brahmanam va yam raja pasenadi kosalo payirupaseyya.
sn44.1:2.2: Addasa kho so puriso khemam bhikkhunim toranavatthusmim vasam upagatam.
sn44.1:2.3: Disvana yena raja pasenadi kosalo tenupasankami; upasankamitva rajanam pasenadim kosalam etadavoca:
sn44.1:3.1: “Natthi kho, deva, toranavatthusmim tatharupo samano va brahmano va yam devo payirupaseyya.
sn44.1:3.2: Atthi ca kho, deva, khema nama bhikkhuni, tassa bhagavato savika arahato sammasambuddhassa.
sn44.1:3.3: Tassa kho pana ayyaya evam kalyano kittisaddo abbhuggato:
sn44.1:4.1: Atha kho raja pasenadi kosalo yena khema bhikkhuni tenupasankami; upasankamitva khemam bhikkhunim abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho raja pasenadi kosalo khemam bhikkhunim etadavoca:
sn44.1:4.2: “kim nu kho, ayye, hoti tathagato param marana”ti?
sn44.1:4.5: “Kim panayye, na hoti tathagato param marana”ti?
sn44.1:4.8: “Kim nu kho, ayye, hoti ca na ca hoti tathagato param marana”ti?
sn44.1:4.10: ‘hoti ca na ca hoti tathagato param marana’”ti.
sn44.1:4.11: “Kim panayye, neva hoti na na hoti tathagato param marana”ti.
sn44.1:4.13: ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathagato param marana’”ti.
sn44.1:5.1: “‘Kim nu kho, ayye, hoti tathagato param marana’ti, iti puttha samana:
sn44.1:5.4: ‘Kim panayye, na hoti tathagato param marana’ti iti puttha samana:
sn44.1:5.6: na hoti tathagato param marana’ti vadesi.
sn44.1:5.7: ‘Kim nu kho, ayye, hoti ca na ca hoti tathagato param marana’ti iti puttha samana:
sn44.1:5.9: hoti ca na ca hoti tathagato param marana’ti vadesi.
sn44.1:5.10: ‘Kim panayye, neva hoti na na hoti tathagato param marana’ti iti puttha samana:
sn44.1:5.12: neva hoti na na hoti tathagato param marana’ti vadesi.
sn44.1:5.13: Ko nu kho, ayye, hetu, ko paccayo yenetam abyakatam bhagavata”ti?
sn44.1:6.1: “Tena hi, maharaja, tannevettha patipucchissami. Yatha te khameyya tatha nam byakareyyasi.
sn44.1:6.3: atthi te koci ganako va muddiko va sankhayako va yo pahoti gangaya valukam ganetum—
sn44.1:6.4: ettaka valuka iti va, ettakani valukasatani iti va, ettakani valukasahassani iti va, ettakani valukasatasahassani iti va”ti?
sn44.1:6.6: “Atthi pana te koci ganako va muddiko va sankhayako va yo pahoti mahasamudde udakam ganetum—
sn44.1:6.7: ettakani udakalhakani iti va, ettakani udakalhakasatani iti va, ettakani udakalhakasahassani iti va, ettakani udakalhakasatasahassani iti va”ti?
sn44.1:6.11: “Evameva kho, maharaja, yena rupena tathagatam pannapayamano pannapeyya tam rupam tathagatassa pahinam ucchinnamulam talavatthukatam anabhavankatam ayatim anuppadadhammam.
sn44.1:6.12: Rupasankhayavimutto kho, maharaja, tathagato gambhiro appameyyo duppariyogaho—
sn44.1:6.14: ‘Hoti tathagato param marana’tipi na upeti, ‘na hoti tathagato param marana’tipi na upeti, ‘hoti ca na ca hoti tathagato param marana’tipi na upeti, ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathagato param marana’tipi na upeti.
sn44.1:7.1: Yaya vedanaya tathagatam pannapayamano pannapeyya, sa vedana tathagatassa pahina ucchinnamula talavatthukata anabhavankata ayatim anuppadadhamma.
sn44.1:7.2: Vedanasankhayavimutto, maharaja, tathagato gambhiro appameyyo duppariyogaho—
sn44.1:7.4: ‘Hoti tathagato param marana’tipi na upeti, ‘na hoti tathagato param marana’tipi na upeti, ‘hoti ca na ca hoti tathagato param marana’tipi na upeti, ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathagato param marana’tipi na upeti.
sn44.1:8.2: yehi sankharehi tathagatam pannapayamano pannapeyya, te sankhara tathagatassa pahina ucchinnamula talavatthukata anabhavankata ayatim anuppadadhamma.
sn44.1:8.3: Sankharasankhayavimutto kho, maharaja, tathagato gambhiro appameyyo duppariyogaho—
sn44.1:8.5: ‘Hoti tathagato param marana’tipi na upeti, ‘na hoti tathagato param marana’tipi na upeti, ‘hoti ca na ca hoti tathagato param marana’tipi na upeti, ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathagato param marana’tipi na upeti.
sn44.1:9.1: Yena vinnanena tathagatam pannapayamano pannapeyya tam vinnanam tathagatassa pahinam ucchinnamulam talavatthukatam anabhavankatam ayatim anuppadadhammam.
sn44.1:9.2: Vinnanasankhayavimutto kho, maharaja, tathagato gambhiro appameyyo duppariyogaho—
sn44.1:9.4: ‘Hoti tathagato param marana’tipi na upeti, ‘na hoti tathagato param marana’tipi na upeti, ‘hoti ca na ca hoti tathagato param marana’tipi na upeti, ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathagato param marana’tipi na upeti”ti.
sn44.1:9.5: Atha kho raja pasenadi kosalo khemaya bhikkhuniya bhasitam abhinanditva anumoditva utthayasana khemam bhikkhunim abhivadetva padakkhinam katva pakkami.
sn44.1:10.1: Atha kho raja pasenadi kosalo aparena samayena yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho raja pasenadi kosalo bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn44.1:10.2: “kim nu kho, bhante, hoti tathagato param marana”ti?
sn44.1:10.5: “Kim pana, bhante, na hoti tathagato param marana”ti?
sn44.1:10.8: “Kim nu kho, bhante, hoti ca na ca hoti tathagato param marana”ti?
sn44.1:10.10: ‘hoti ca na ca hoti tathagato param marana’”ti.
sn44.1:10.11: “Kim pana, bhante, neva hoti na na hoti tathagato param marana”ti?
sn44.1:10.13: ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathagato param marana’”ti.
sn44.1:10.14: “‘Kim nu kho, bhante, hoti tathagato param marana’ti iti puttho samano:
sn44.1:10.15: ‘abyakatam kho etam, maharaja, maya—hoti tathagato param marana’ti vadesi …pe….
sn44.1:10.16: “‘Kim pana, bhante, neva hoti na na hoti tathagato param marana’ti iti puttho samano:
sn44.1:10.18: neva hoti na na hoti tathagato param marana’ti vadesi.
sn44.1:10.19: Ko nu kho, bhante, hetu, ko paccayo, yenetam abyakatam bhagavata”ti?
sn44.1:11.1: “Tena hi, maharaja, tannevettha patipucchissami. Yatha te khameyya tatha nam byakareyyasi.
sn44.1:11.2: Tam kim mannasi, maharaja, atthi te koci ganako va muddiko va sankhayako va yo pahoti gangaya valukam ganetum—
sn44.1:11.3: ettaka valuka iti va …pe… ettakani valukasatasahassani iti va”ti?
sn44.1:11.5: “Atthi pana te koci ganako va muddiko va sankhayako va yo pahoti mahasamudde udakam ganetum—
sn44.1:11.6: ettakani udakalhakani iti va …pe… ettakani udakalhakasatasahassani iti va”ti?
sn44.1:11.10: Evameva kho, maharaja, yena rupena tathagatam pannapayamano pannapeyya, tam rupam tathagatassa pahinam ucchinnamulam talavatthukatam anabhavankatam ayatim anuppadadhammam.
sn44.1:11.11: Rupasankhayavimutto kho, maharaja, tathagato gambhiro appameyyo duppariyogaho—
sn44.1:11.14: ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathagato param marana’tipi na upeti.
sn44.1:12.1: Yena vinnanena tathagatam pannapayamano pannapeyya, tam vinnanam tathagatassa pahinam ucchinnamulam talavatthukatam anabhavankatam ayatim anuppadadhammam.
sn44.1:12.2: Vinnanasankhayavimutto kho, maharaja, tathagato gambhiro appameyyo duppariyogaho—
sn44.1:12.4: ‘Hoti tathagato param marana’tipi na upeti, ‘na hoti tathagato param marana’tipi na upeti, ‘hoti ca na ca hoti tathagato param marana’tipi na upeti, ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathagato param marana’tipi na upeti”ti.
sn44.1:13.2: Yatra hi nama satthu ceva savikaya ca atthena attho byanjanena byanjanam samsandissati, samessati, na virodhayissati yadidam aggapadasmim.
sn44.1:13.3: Ekamidaham, bhante, samayam khemam bhikkhunim upasankamitva etamattham apucchim.
sn44.1:13.4: Sapi me ayya etehi padehi etehi byanjanehi etamattham byakasi, seyyathapi bhagava.
sn44.1:13.6: Yatra hi nama satthu ceva savikaya ca atthena attho byanjanena byanjanam samsandissati, samessati, na virodhayissati yadidam aggapadasmim.
sn44.1:13.10: Atha kho raja pasenadi kosalo bhagavato bhasitam abhinanditva anumoditva utthayasana bhagavantam abhivadetva padakkhinam katva pakkamiti.
